18 import time
19 import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
20 
21 from ..common.io_objects import PinMode, NiryoIO
22 
23 
24 class DigitalPin(NiryoIO):
25 
26  def __init__(self, lock, pin, name, mode, state=False):
27  super(DigitalPin, self).__init__(lock, pin, name)
28 
29  GPIO.setwarnings(False)
30  GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
31 
32  self._mode = None
33  self.mode = mode
34 
35  time.sleep(0.01)
36  if self._mode == PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT:
37  self.value = state
38  else:
39  self._read()
40 
41  def _read(self):
42  with self._lock:
43  try:
44  self._value = GPIO.input(self._pin)
45  except RuntimeError:
46  pass
47 
48  @property
49  def value(self):
50  if self._mode == PinMode.DIGITAL_INPUT:
51  self._read()
52  return self._value
53 
54  @value.setter
55  def value(self, value):
56  if self._mode == PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT:
57  with self._lock:
58  self._value = bool(value)
59  try:
60  GPIO.output(self._pin, GPIO.HIGH if self._value else GPIO.LOW)
61  except RuntimeError:
62  pass
63 
64  @property
65  def mode(self):
66  return self._mode
67 
68  @mode.setter
69  def mode(self, mode):
70  self._mode = mode
71  if mode == PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT:
72  with self._lock:
73  GPIO.setup(self._pin, GPIO.OUT)
74  time.sleep(0.01)
75  self.value = GPIO.LOW
76  else:
77  GPIO.setup(self._pin, GPIO.IN)
78  time.sleep(0.01)
79  self._read()
80 
81 
82 class Fan(DigitalPin):
83 
84  def __init__(self, lock, pin, name, temperature_on_threshold, temperature_off_threshold):
85  super(Fan, self).__init__(lock, pin, name, PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT, False)
86 
87  self.temperature_on_threshold = temperature_on_threshold
88  self.temperature_off_threshold = temperature_off_threshold
89 
90  def update(self, temperature):
91  if temperature >= self.temperature_on_threshold:
92  self.value = 1
93  elif temperature <= self.temperature_off_threshold:
94  self.value = 0
95 
96 
97 class Led(DigitalPin):
98 
99  def __init__(self, lock, pin, name):
100  super(Led, self).__init__(lock, pin, name, PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT, False)
101 
102  def on(self):
103  self.value = 1
104 
105  def off(self):
106  self.value = 0
